headline: The best and worst airlines stocks of 2024
summary: It has been feast or famine for the airline industry this year. An uneven merger landscape had a ripple effect on several players, and a sector-wide shift towards the premium end of the market left budget carriers scrambling to rethink their business models. That chaos showed up in stock prices, which ranged from nearly triple-digit losses to triple-digit gains.
